text: María Magdalena Teresa Ruiz Guiñazú (15 February 1935 – 6 September 2022)MAGDALENA RUIZ GUIÑAZÚ was an Argentine writer and journalist. She worked in the National Commission on the Disappearance of Persons. She won the Golden Martín Fierro award in 1993. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Writers from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine journalists
title: Magdalena Ruiz Guiñazú
